Posts.Content: Jul 5, 2013 06:30PM Robin1221 wrote: Hi everyone!  I too am a first timer at this.  My chemo treatment will start on July 18th as well - TC - 4x every 3 weeks, then radiation and hormone therapy.  I am very scared of the unknown, as all of you are.  Luckily my kids are older, living at home and can help out.  My husband is so supportive, as are friends and family.  My oncologist doesn't want to put in a port, which I am happy about.  Had MRI, PET scan which all came back negative.  Onctotype DX came back with a score of 12, but 2 out of 2 sentinel nodes came back with cancer cells.  What is everyone getting to prepare for chemo?  I haven't really hit the boards yet.  I am staying positive and tell my kids that I plan on being around for a very long time to annoy the crap out of them!  We all need to stay strong and KNOW that we will beat this!  Looking forward to talking to you all and having a great support network!
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo July 2013 Mellie289 JeriGrace
